description:
Hunter thought all this modeling bullshit was just that but he gave the number on the card a call anyway and I smoothed everything out and convinced him to take the next step and come to our hotel. Hunter is 5'11' and 190 lbs. and built like a brick shit house, but there's nothing stinking about this big, sweet Marine. Hunter really puts on a show for the camera as he talks to us and asks the viewer if they'd like to suck his cock, ride his cock and eat his manly ass. Hunter is sheer energy in this scene and you'd never think for a second that he was skeptical about it all at first.

(Scene 2 of 5 in 'Devil Dawg Dick'.)
title: Hunter
